3: How many times do I have to tell you? This is our sandpit!
Stop coming to our turf! We're not going to play with you! Go away!
Ha, learned your lesson yet? Now scram!
You're in for a beating if you don't scram now!
But... I want to play here too... Grandpa said...
Grandpa? That old nutcase who got chased out of town? The crazy old nutter adopted a D-U-M-M-Y! Dummy!
The crazy old nutter adopted a dummy—
Grandpa is not a crazy old nutter! Grandpa is very good to me! And he's really awesome, too! Y-you two don't know a thing!
You don't know anything... You're lying! I won't allow you to speak ill of Grandpa! Or else I'll—
You'll what? The dummy who doesn't even know how to fight.
